text: Where do you work?  I drive a big black car and my favorite art is guns n roses
I've never heard of them. I do not drive much. I'm a stay at home mom.
Do you have any kids?  How many?  Do you like to spend time with them?
I do have two kids. We like to go to movies. What about you?
My favorite movie is gone with the wind.  Have you ever seen it?  It's my favorite.
I have never seen it. I should check it out sometime.  What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of music. I like classical the most. What kind do you listen to?
A little bit of everything.  I am trying to learn more about music since I am a stay-at-home mom.
That's very nice. I would love to be a stayed-at home mom someday.
Me too!  I wish I had more time for hobbies.  Do yo have any hobbies?
We don't have a lending system where I live. We just give each other cash.
That's what I do too. The interest is too high and I don't want to do anything
I understand. That would make things a lot easier.  What else do you do for fun?
I like to go biking. I am a veterinarian. What about you?
I like drawing and playing video games.  I donate all my money to charity so I can do those things
That's a great idea. Do you have any hobbies? What video games do you like to play?
I play a lot of video games like Life is Strange.  Do you like video games?
I do like them, but not as much as I like biking! Do you ride bikes?
I have!  It's pretty fun!  Do your dogs like to ride biking with you?
They do! It's really fun watching them run around while I ride. How about you with your pets?
That is true. Sometimes, people are too hard on themselves. I think the trick is to just be yourself.
Yes, exactly! So why don't you try and be yourself more often? Don't you find that it's so much fun?
I do! But I feel like it's impossible to be myself when everyone wants to be around me.
You can say this, "I like you, but I'm not into you." I bet there's someone out there who feels the same way.
I'm sure there is. I need to be a little more confident about it. Maybe one day.
It will be hard, but you'll get there! Just be yourself and you'll meet the right person!
Thank you so much for the encouraging words. I really appreciate it. I hope you have a great day.
You too! Don't let people get you down, just get out there and find someone who will make you happy!
I'm trying. You're right. I just have to keep my head up. Thank you.
No problem! I'm rooting for you! Just stay positive! I believe you'll find someone soon!
That sounds scary! I prefer the daytime, I really don't like being alone. It's kind of boring.
Yeah, I feel the same way. My romantic experiences have ended poorly so I wish I was more serious.
I'm sorry to hear that! Romance isn't for everyone. I prefer being alone, that's why I'm single.
Oh, yeah, I have no problem with being alone sometimes. What's your favorite food?
I love everything spicy! What is yours? Do you have any favorite foods?
I love Indian food. I like spicy stuff, too! I also really love Korean food.
Me too! Kfc is my favorite fast food place. What is your favorite korean dish?
I love KFC, too. I usually get the chicken sandwich, because it's cheap.
That's the best part about fast food! My two favorite kinds of food are KFC and Indian food!
What is it that you love about Indian food? I love the spicy sauces!
They really did. I loved spending time with my grandparents.    You?
Yes, they are my world.  Do you have any memories with your grandparent?
Yes, we all used to help my grandmother when she was sick. It was very rewarding.
That's great.  My grandparent took care of my grandfather when he was ill as well.  I miss that time when I was young.
I'm so glad to hear you had such a great grandparent to care for you when you were young.
That is very kind of you to say.  What happened to your grandfarther?  Did he pass away recently?
Yes, he passed away several years ago. He was pretty sick for a long time.  His death was unexpected.
I'm sorry for your loss.  Did you have a lot of good memories of him?
Well, yes I had many memories with him.  He was always there for me when I needed him.
That is wonderful.  We need more people like that in the world. I'm glad you still have great memories of your grandpa.
No I'm the youngest. I live with my adoptive dad.  He works at HP.
wow thats cool . do you get to see him often ? how long have you been with him ?
I see him every weekend.  I've only been with my dad for about 8 years.  What about you?
My husband and I have been married 10 yrs, so it is easy to see each other a lot.
Wow, that's amazing.  Congrats!  I hope to get married in the near future.
I hope you get married.  It is a lot of fun.  My wife and I started dating in high school.
It sounds like you've found your soulmate, congratulations.  Do you have any kids?
Yes, I have two kids.  They are 16 and 16.  Are you married with kids?
Yes, a little boy and daughter who are now in highschool.  How old are your kids?
2 and 5 years old.  We all have a lot in common with each other.  Where are you from?
I love eating eggs! I don't like hard boiled though. Do you like hardboiled eggs?
I love hard boil. Do u have any hobbies? I like to cook and drink tea
I really enjoy taking care of my cats. I also enjoy playing with them and hanging out with them. What about you?
I love animals. I've two pugs. Cats are the best. What's your cats name?
My cats name is Boomer. Do your pugs have a name?  I've always wanted to get a pug
They don't have a specific name. I just call them all cats lol. What kind of dog do you want?
Any kind really. I'd love to have a beagle or a poodle. Do they shed much?
They do not shed at all. They do shed a lot, however, and they need lots of grooming. Do poodles have a good sense of smell?
Yes, they definitely do. Poodles are a breed of hairless dog and they are supposed to be easy to take care of.
Are they the best breed for a first dog? I'd like to get one that would be easier to train.
Wow, that's a big cat! I do yowa everyday and I have a cat.
Oh really? I do not know much about yoga, is it all about meditation?
It is a form of yogic meditation. Do you practice any kind of yin yogurt?
No, I have never done yogurat. Have you heard of the Appalachian trail? That is where I want to travel to one day.
I have! Do you have any other hobbies? Mine are basketball, rock climbing, and video games.
I like to play video games too. What console do you play on?  I also like to eat.
I play on xbox. I enjoy eating as well. What type of food do you like?
I like burgers, but I'm trying to eat healthier. How about you?  What do you do for a living?
I work at a coffeehouse. What about you, what do you want to do for work?
I have no idea at the moment. I am still in high school. Whats your favorite kind of food?
I had a friend in college who was really into the show, she always liked the colors and patterns.
My friend was into the toy and she told me she wanted to dress up like the pony characters and go to conventions
what do you mean she wanted dress up? is it like a MLP convention or something else?
Yeah, she wanted too dress up as the pegasus and fly around the world. Her parents let her
that sounds awesome. I'm glad she was able to do that.  Was it fun?
It was! She got to meet a lot of famous people and flew around in the sky.
that's so cool!  I wish my friends were that creative.  She sounds like a real catch.
She was! What kind of stuff do you do in your spare time?  Do you like music?
I play guitar, and I do like music. What about you? What kind do you like?
I enjoy classic rock. My favorite band is the cramps. What bands do you listen to?
That's interesting.  I wish I could speak more languages, it would be a lot easier.  Do you speak more then one language?
No, I speak Spanish and French. It is hard for me to learn a second language. I wish i knew more languages
That's cool.  One day I hope to learn more languages too.  Right now I am focusing on german.
What motivated you to learn german? I think it is cool how German is the second most widely spoken language in the world
Well, it has its roots in the Roman empire, and it was the third most spoken in Europe after English and French
Very interesting. I didn't know that. Thanks for the history lesson.  Have a great day!
You as well! Thanks for chatting with me!  Take care.  And take care of yourself.
You too! Have a good day! XD!  Good luck in your studies! :D
I appreciate it!  And good luck with your studying as well.  No more Reddit for me! :)
No more reddit for me either, thank you so much! :) You do the same! :)
Oh that's cool. Do you like your job? I actually just started at my bank.
Its okay, but its not really my goal in life. What do you do at your bank?
I work as a teller at my local bank. It's not the best job, but it pays the bills.
That sounds like a good job. We need more people like you in this world.  lol
Thanks, I appreciate that. Most of my coworkers are pretty cool people. You'd probably enjoy it!
I'm sure I would. It would be nice to work at a place where people are nice.
It would! Do you have any hobbies? I play lots of card games. \
I've always enjoyed gardening. What kind of card game do you play? !
I play Pokemon. You can download the game online. It is super fun.  What kind do you like?
I enjoy YuGiOh. It can be a little addictive. Have you ever played it?
That sounds like a lot of fun!  What kind of food is it?  I could go for some pasta or something.
pasta is great. i am excited to try it. what type of food are you most excited to eat?
I love pasta.  It's one of the most common food items in the world.  Do you have any other favorites?
I love hot dogs with pepperoni and ketchup.  What is your favorite type of pasta?
I love Italian food and italians in general, so I would say fettuccine.
That's a great choice.  I also like spaghetti and meatballs, but I think fettuuccini is my favorite too.
I would love to travel to Italy someday, and try the authentic stuff. I think my favorite is spagetti with meatball sauce, and meat balls as well.
Do you also like lasagna? It's basically a flatbread usually filled with tomato sauce and cheese, and then baked in the oven.
I do like lasagnna, but not as much as I love spageti and tomatoes. I can make it, but it's never quite right.
It's definitely a favorite of mine and one of my favorite dishes. It's a shame you can't make it right.
That's good. My parents were separated when I was 12. Now I'm in college and happy.
My parents divorce was pretty dramatic, so I was only 13 when it ended, and I was fine with it. How old are you now?
I am 25 now. What do you do for a living? I'm a vet. I love it.
I am a teacher. I hate it, but it pays the bills. Do you have any pets?
I have two cats. They're pretty much my children.  Haha.  What kind of pets do you have?
I have a boston terrier, and a basset hound. They keep me busy.
I bet! I have never owned a dog, but I bet they're a lot of work!
The boston's definitely take up most of my time. What about you? What do your parents do?
My mom is a teacher and my dad is a physician, but both of them are retired now.
Well, that sounds pretty interesting. What subject do you teach?  My dad is an accountant.
I have a dog. He's a labrador.  Do you like dogs?
Yes. I have 2 of them. They are the best. I just love them.
I grew up with a small dog named Woof.  What is your dogs name?
My dog's name is Fido. He loves eating flowers.  Have you ever had a dog?
I have had many dogs over the years. Do you have a big family?  I've got three.
I've a small family myself.  I moved a lot when I was younger so it was hard to find a family.
It is nice to have a large family. It has its benefits. What do you do for a living?
I am a librarian at a local college.  How about yourself?  What do your parents do?
My father is an accountant. My mother is a doctor. Both of my parents are physicians.
Do you ever want to be a doctor like your parents?  It seems like a fun profession.
I am sorry to hear that. Did you get in an accidents or was it an accident?
i was in a car accident while i was on a farm . i lost it there . i am a farmberer .
Oh wow, I'm so sorry to here that. Was it a life long accident or just a minor one?
the accident happened over night . it was a life threatening injury . what do you do ? farmer ?
I am a nurse and have been for 12 years. My husband is a carpenter.
wow that's interesting . i'm studying to be a nurses too . what kind of work do you and your husband do ?
My husband works in the medical field and he is an orthopedic surgeon. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to hike and run . I also like to play video games and read books . What about you ?
I like the outdoors and playing video games too. I also enjoy camping. Do what makes you happy.
that's good . what part of the world do you live in ?  i live in the southern part
What kind of dog do you have? My dog would love to go with me, but I don't want to cause him any discomfort.
i have a frenchie he can be kind of a handful. what kind of dogs do you own?
I have a Labrador, he's a great dog but doesn't enjoy ski trips. Do you go skiiing much?
yes i do! it was my favorite thing to do as a kid. what does your lab like to do?
He loves to run, and he loves being close to people.  What do you do for work?
i just started a job at a pharmacy. what do you like to eat? i love pizza.
I'm a chef, what pharma store do you work at?  I love pizza too, but need to watch my calories!
right now i work at a local grocery store. I eat out a lot though. you?
I try to, but it's hard at work sometimes.  How long have you been a chefer?
2 years. it is hard at times but it pays good. what about you? do you enjoy your work?
That's unfortunate. I'm leaving college in 3 months, and Walmart isn't allowed there either.
What are you going to school for? If it's anything like pianos, you will love it.
I'm going for accounting. I love piano music, so that's what I'm taking in college.
In my opinion, music is the most important thing you can do with your life. I wish I had gotten into music when I was younger.
I know what you mean. It's kind of therapeutic to me, too.
I can definitely understand that. Therapy is great for the soul.  Who's your favorite artist?
I don't really have a favorite artist. I just love listening to music.  What about you?
I love a lot of different artists.  My favorite artists are Taylor Swift and Adele.
I can't say that I know too much about Tay Tay. What do you like about her?
She's a multi-instrumentalist.  She uses a lot different elements in her music to express herself.
I didn't know that! It must have been a long time ago. How long do you think it will last?
I'm not sure, but it is one of the world's most read newspapers.
That's cool. I read a lot of New York times too. Do you have any other pets?
I don't have any pets right now.  How about you?  What's your favorite color?
I have two cats and a dog. I love all of them. I really love red! What about you
I really like blue.  It's a pretty color.  What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read and play games on my laptop. What about yourself? Do you like doing anything fun?
I like reading and playing video games too.  I also like to spend time with my husband.
Sounds like you have a lot going on in your life! How long have you been married?
It's been eight years this June.  We have been married for 20 years.
I don't think I could handle it. I'm sorry you haven't been sleeping well.
me too . i can barely get out of bed at night because of my narcolepsy .
Oh, I'm so sorry! How do you deal with it? Is there anything you can do to help?
I take medication and take naps at night. They are sometimes used to treat Narcolepse, but I don;t think it helps that much.
I have never heard of naps being used for narcolegpse before. Is that something you have tried?
I've never tried it, but my friends have told me it can help. I think I'll try it the next time I feel a panic attack.
If you do, I hope you feel better! I'd try it if I were you. Good luck!
Thank you, and same to you! You seem like a really nice person. Take care! :)
You too! Take care and be careful out there! :) I wish you the best of luck!
Thank you! Same to you, have a great day! :) Take care. :))))
Do you know what Hot Chilli Pepper is? It is a band formed in Los Angeles, California.
No,I've not heard of Hot Chile Pepper before,what kind of music is it?
It is rock. It was formed by the band's members Anthony Kiedis, Flea, and Chad Smith.
I believe Anthon Kiedes was born in 1974,I don't know much about him other than that.
Yes, he was born on March 8, 1981. He joined the group in 1985.
Is he a singer, bassist, rhythm guitarist, and vocalist?
He is the lead vocal, guitarist and rhythem guitar player. He also does vocals.
I believe I have heard one of his songs before, it was called "Purple Haze".
Yes, that was the name of the first song he made. He released his debut album in 1990.
I'll have to listen to more of his stuff, maybe I'll be able to find a few of his other hits.
